name: Break Free (Kassem_m31)
description:
Please Read The Controls

'Break Free' is a prison escape game where you, a high tech weapon  designer got arrested and your technology is being recycled into your cell. The prison uses a high tech laser that is connected between everyone in the cell if something goes through the laser the guards get alerted.

This game was created in only 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 and might have some bugs.

Controls KeyboardGamePadMovementWASD or Arrow KeysLeft Stick and The South Button
InteractingEButton East
SwitchTabButton West
